snippet: A 20-year veteran of the Police Department pleaded guilty to arranging to hack into dozens of email accounts.
abstract: New York City Police Detective Edwin Vargas pleads guilty to arranging to hack into dozens of email accounts and to gain access to a federal law enforcement database in order to gather information on his colleagues
lead_paragraph: A 20-year veteran of the Police Department pleaded guilty to arranging to hack into dozens of email accounts.
